title: Modern san serif swash font?
content:
Hello does anyone know what this swash font is or something similar? The attached image is from APFEL's identity done for the Turner Prize and they say it is custom however Dazed and Confused use something similar in their spreads?

Any leads would be a help!

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20101225125702/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_197.png) | 21.55 KB |
author: iheartfinn

comments.content:
Dazed and Confused uses Estilo.

Dino dos Santos  
DSTYPE
ah thanks very much! yes I think it is estilo I am after!
I've found it. It's a new version of the Woolf Olins Tate typeface made by [APFEL - A Practice for Everyday Life](http://web.archive.org/web/20101225125702/http:/www.apracticeforeverydaylife.com/)...
